item.title: Demon Sword Maiden
item.description: Demon Sword Maiden revolves around a boy who was sent to a dark, mysterious parallel world in the body of his beautiful senior sister, Lily. The lone girl ran into the night parade of a hundred demons the very day she arrived; seeking survival amongst the warriorâ€™s dispute in a chaotic world, and forging her own demon sword! This is an unimaginable other world adventure!
